= fasta2tsv =

== Format ==
cg fasta2tsv ?infile? ?outfile?

== Summary ==
Converts data in fasta format to tab-separated format ([[tsv]]).

== Arguments ==
; **infile**: file to be converted, if not given (or -), uses stdin. File may be compressed.
; **outfile**: write results to outfile, if not given, uses stdout

== Category ==
Format Conversion
